text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text:
That's the "Mega Tree"! I wonder how it will be decorated? I'm 
looking forward to it☆ Talmae, Acute!

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text:
Ricky, you're already too excited! You're not here for fun today, 
you're here for the preview of the Christmas concert.

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text:
I know! I'm working in collaboration with Oi Racecourse. I'll 
bring you good luck with my feng shui!

text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute
text_block_list.text:
I'm sure it's a fun job… You know, that…… is there? It's going to 
be sparkling with that Irumineshon, isn't it?

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text:
Yes! It's called "Tokyo Mega Illumi"! 
It's a big event at the Oi racetrack!

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text:
Illumination throughout the racetrack is breathtaking! In front 
of Tomakomai Station It's a photogenic event that's getting a lot 
of attention right now.

text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute
text_block_list.text:
Well, well, it's a great honor for us to be able to collab with 
such a great event and have a Christmas party.

text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute
text_block_list.text:
…… but the scenery still looks rather dreary 
for an event that is about to start. ……?

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: ―!!! This Ki flow is…… maybe some trouble!

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Eh, no way, that's not such a good omen. ……

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Of course! No way, no way, no way, it's a big deal!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
I just happened to overhear some people at the racetrack talking 
about it earlier: ……

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
There was some kind of mistake in bringing in the decorations and 
ornaments, so they're running behind schedule!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
If we're not careful, we may not have the decorations up in time 
for the Christmas concert.

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: That's when it happens! Ricky☆Lucky☆horsegirl Power!

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text:
Let's help bring it in ourselves! If we combine the power of 
horsegirl and the luck of Feng Shui and the luck of Feng Shui, 
we'll have a million barikis!

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text:
Feng Shui…… aside, I agree with you about helping out! Damage 
from an event like this is so unfashionable!

text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute
text_block_list.text:
I'm all for it. ♪ It's a chance to give back to the racetracks 
that have always taken care of us. It's a chance to return the 
favor to Ms. Racecourse, who has always been so kind to me.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
'I want to help, and I need your help, Ricky and the others.' I 
thought I came to…… to ask for your help.

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Hehehe, you said everything we were going to say before we did!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Yeah, I'm counting on you. ……!

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text:
Alright then, let's all work together 
to make the "Mega Tree" sparkle!

text_block_list.name: Everyone
text_block_list.text: Oooooh!
